title: Coronavirus: China’s death toll increases by 50%
description: A further twelve hundred and ninety fatalities have been added to the number of deaths related to Covid-19 in Wuhan, the epicentre of the virus. The authorities say it was a statistical verification to ensure accuracy. Also in the programme: Germany has decla…
content:
A further twelve hundred and ninety fatalities have been added to the number of deaths related to Covid-19 in Wuhan, the epicentre of the virus. The authorities say it was a statistical verification to ensure accuracy.
